items.title: Early BNB Investorâ€™s $1,000 Stake Becomes $1 Million as BNB Surpasses $1,000
items.excerpt: An early BNB holder has seen a $1,000 stake grow to $1 million as BNB topped the $1,000 mark, prompting renewed attention from on-chain trackers and market strategists. Analysts and industry figures cite the milestone as evidence of long-term payoff, growing utility and broader market rotation into altcoins.
